topic.title: Viewing Account Information
topic.p: Your Account Information window provides you with the following information:

ul.li: Your Server Name, displaying the name you have assigned to this server.
Disk Usage figure, displaying how much disk space you have used and have left.
Number of Open Files, displaying what files are currently open by running processes.
Number of Processes, displaying the processes currently running on your VPS.
Number of Virtual Hosts, describing how many virtual hosts you have.
Number of Users, describing how many users you have.

ol.title: To view your account information:

li.p: In the System Administration menu group, click View Account Information (expand the menu group to see the links, if necessary). For more information about expanding and collapsing menu groups, see Menus and Navigation.

ol.li: The View Account information window appears, displaying your account information.
